item.description:
How did Labor get here so fast?  Let's hold on to Summer a little while longer by getting together for Sunday Brunch followed by hopping a 12:30pm Harbor Ferry to Spectacle Island.  Jazz musicians from Berklee will be there to regale and entertain us.  Could a Summer Sunday get better than that?

 

 

 

After brunch, we'll go over to get the 12:30pm Harbor Express Ferry.  The tickets are $15.00 round-trip and it is strongly advisable to purchase ferry tickets in advance. There are two links below which will assist you in obtaining tickets.  We can return to Boston on the 4:30pm ferry.
http://www.bostonharborislands.org/ferry-schedule-summer

http://www.bostonsbestcruises.com/boston-harbor-islands-schedules-and-fares

Several amenities, nice walking path, and a beautiful view of the city make Spectacle Island a nice place to spend a Sunday afternoon.

http://www.bostonharborislands.org/event-details?x=1&rid=1756

 

Let's look for a place to eat or get a drink when we get back to Boston.  We can talk about it while we're out on the island.
item.how_to_find_us: The Harbor Islands Ferry ticket kiosk. It's in Christopher Columbus Park, next to the Long Wharf Marriott.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Berklee Jazz on Spectacle Island
